name: Raptors Kenney Jam
description:
2D Space shooter arcade. You mother ship done emergency jump. But the area is active asteroid field. Settle the work craft and go collect material for fuel to travel home. But protect the craft from rocks on colliding curse, local angry monster and undisciplined others pilots causing unhealthy traffic.

(1 primary weapon, 4 secondary types, random selected upgrades)

PS: On WebGL build from unity caused bug on ui on database panel. On Others form of builds or inner unity play mod the ui is normal.
